plot outline: The plot is set in a rural backdrop where three middle class characters running a hotel come across three different circumstances facing three important life decision that is going to change their lives forever. The film charts the path taken by them to achieve their goal and details how they traverse through to nowhere.
title: Dharani
plot: The film is about three men who are ambitious, and want to do well in life.
